SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean

Class UserBean

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean.UserBean
@ApplicationScoped public class UserBean extends Object
The UserBean class is responsible for managing UserEntity instances. It is an application scoped bean, meaning there is a single instance for the entire application.

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultUsersIfNotExistent

      public void createDefaultUsersIfNotExistent() throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Creates a default user with username "admin" if it does not exist. The user is created with predefined values.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      UnsupportedEncodingException

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(RegisterUserDto registerUserDto)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      registerUserDto - the DTO containing user registration details
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully registered, false otherwise

    • confirmEmail

      public boolean confirmEmail(String token)
      Confirms the user's email.
      Parameters:
      token -
      Returns:

    • createProfile

      public boolean createProfile(UserProfileDto userProfileDto, String auxiliarToken)
      Creates a new user profile.
      Parameters:
      userProfileDto - the DTO containing user profile details
      auxiliarToken - the token used to authenticate the user
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully created, false otherwise

    • saveUserProfilePicture

      public boolean saveUserProfilePicture(String auth, String base64Image)
      Saves a user's profile picture from a Base64 encoded string. This method decodes the Base64 string to an image, determines the image format, and saves the original image along with resized versions for avatar and thumbnail use. It updates the user entity with URLs to these images.
      Parameters:
      auth - The authentication token or session ID used to identify the user.
      base64Image - The Base64 encoded string of the image to be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the image was successfully saved and the user entity updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the user cannot be found or if an error occurs during image processing.

    • loginUser

      public String loginUser(RegisterUserDto registerUserDto, String clientIpAddress, String userAgent)
      Attempts to log in a user with the provided credentials. If successful, it checks for an existing session. If one exists, it is refreshed and returned. Otherwise, a new session is created and returned.
      Parameters:
      registerUserDto - The DTO containing the user's login credentials.
      clientIpAddress - The IP address of the client attempting to log in.
      userAgent - The user agent of the client attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      The session ID if login is successful; null otherwise.

    • createSessionForUser

      public String createSessionForUser(UserEntity userEntity, String clientIpAddress, String userAgent)
      Creates a new session for a user, or refreshes an existing one. This method is used internally to manage user sessions upon successful login or session validation.
      Parameters:
      userEntity - The user entity for whom the session is being created or refreshed.
      clientIpAddress - The IP address of the client.
      userAgent - The user agent of the client.
      Returns:
      The session ID of the newly created or refreshed session.

    • sendForgetPassLink

      public boolean sendForgetPassLink(String email)
      Sends a password reset link to the user's email if the user exists. This method generates a new auxiliary token for the user, saves it, and sends an email with a reset link.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user requesting a password reset.
      Returns:
      true if the email was successfully sent, false otherwise.

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String token, String newPassword)
      Resets a user's password given a valid auxiliary token and a new password. The method looks up the user by the auxiliary token, and if found, updates the user's password.
      Parameters:
      token - The auxiliary token associated with the user's password reset request.
      newPassword - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully reset, false otherwise.

    • getUserBySessionId

      public UserEntity getUserBySessionId(String sessionId)
      Retrieves a user entity based on a session ID. This method is commonly used to identify the user associated with a given session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID to look up the user by.
      Returns:
      The UserEntity associated with the session ID, or null if not found.

    • getUserBySystemUsername

      public UserEntity getUserBySystemUsername(String systemUsername)
      Retrieves a user entity based on their system username. This method provides a way to fetch user details using the unique system username.
      Parameters:
      systemUsername - The system username of the user.
      Returns:
      The UserEntity associated with the system username, or null if not found.

    • updateUserProfile

      public void updateUserProfile(UserProfileDto userProfileDto, String sessionId) throws Exception
      Updates a user's profile information based on the provided UserProfileDto and session ID. This method allows users to update their profile details, including first name, last name, lab, and bio.
      Parameters:
      userProfileDto - The DTO containing the new profile information.
      sessionId - The session ID of the user updating their profile.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the session is invalid or required fields are missing.

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(UserEntity user, String password)
      Validates a user's password against the stored hash. This method is used for password verification during login and other authentication processes.
      Parameters:
      user - The user entity whose password is being validated.
      password - The password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(UserEntity user, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password to a new value. This method securely updates the user's password with a new hashed value.
      Parameters:
      user - The user entity whose password is being updated.
      newPassword - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getEditProfile

      public UserProfileDto getEditProfile(String systemUsername, String sessionId)
      Retrieves the profile information of a user for editing purposes, based on their system username and session ID. This method ensures that only authorized users can access and edit their own profile information.
      Parameters:
      systemUsername - The system username of the user whose profile is being edited.
      sessionId - The session ID of the requesting user.
      Returns:
      A UserProfileDto containing the editable profile information.
      Throws:
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - If the user cannot be found.
      UnauthorizedException - If the session ID is invalid or does not match the user.

    • getProfile

      public ShowProfileDto getProfile(String systemUsername, String sessionId)
      Retrieves the public profile information of a user, based on their system username and session ID. This method ensures that sensitive information is only available to authorized users or for public profiles.
      Parameters:
      systemUsername - The system username of the user whose profile is being requested.
      sessionId - The session ID of the requesting user.
      Returns:
      A ShowProfileDto containing the user's public profile information.
      Throws:
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - If the user cannot be found.
      UnauthorizedException - If the session ID is invalid or does not match the user.

    • isUserAdmin

      public boolean isUserAdmin(int userId)
      Checks if a given user ID belongs to an admin user. This method is used to verify if a user has administrative privileges.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user is an admin, false otherwise.

    • isUserCreatorOrManager

      public boolean isUserCreatorOrManager(int userId, String projectSystemName)
      Determines if a user is either the creator or a manager of a given project. This method is used to check a user's permissions within a specific project context.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
      Returns:
      true if the user is a creator or manager of the project, false otherwise.

    • getUserProjectCreationInfoDto

      public UserProjectCreationInfoDto getUserProjectCreationInfoDto(String sessionId, String systemProjectName, RejectedIdsDto rejectedUsersDto, int page, String labName, String keyword)
      Retrieves information for creating a user project, including potential project members. This method supports the project creation process by suggesting users based on various criteria.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user creating the project.
      systemProjectName - The system name of the project for which members are being suggested.
      rejectedUsersDto - A DTO containing IDs of users to exclude from the suggestions.
      page - The pagination page number.
      labName - The name of the lab to filter users by.
      keyword - A keyword to filter users by.
      Returns:
      A UserProjectCreationInfoDto containing information about potential project members.

    • calculateMaximumPageUsers

      public int calculateMaximumPageUsers(int numberOfProjects, int numberOfProjectPerPage)
      Calculates the maximum number of pages for user project creation suggestions. This method aids in pagination by determining the total number of pages based on the number of users.
      Parameters:
      numberOfProjects - The total number of projects.
      numberOfProjectPerPage - The number of projects to display per page.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of pages.

    • getUserInProjectENUM

      public UserInProjectTypeENUM getUserInProjectENUM(String sessionId, String projectSystemName)
      Retrieves the role of a user within a specific project, based on session ID and project system name. This method is used to determine a user's role within a project for access control and display purposes.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
      Returns:
      The UserInProjectTypeENUM representing the user's role in the project, or null if not found.

    • updateLanguage

      public boolean updateLanguage(String sessionId, LanguageENUM language)
      Updates the preferred language of a user. This method allows users to change their preferred language for the application interface.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user requesting the language change.
      language - The new language preference.
      Returns:
      true if the language was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • userHasProjects

      public boolean userHasProjects(String sessionId)
      Checks if a user is involved in any projects as a creator, manager, or member. This method is used to determine if a user has any associated projects.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is involved in any projects, false otherwise.

    • promoteUserToAdmin

      public boolean promoteUserToAdmin(String sessionId, String userToChangeSystemUsername)
      Promotes a user to an admin role. This method allows an existing admin to grant administrative privileges to another user.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the admin user making the request.
      userToChangeSystemUsername - The system username of the user being promoted to admin.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully promoted to admin, false otherwise.
